channel.title: real on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in real on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Real Festival
item.description:
Real’s summer festival just happens to coincide with my birthday and this year they put on a stage show for our benefit.

Birthday Party

item.title: The End of 2020 And It's Not All Bad
item.description:
Disappointed not to get a last cycle in but the wind has been relentless all month, so I settled on a walk with Flo and the girls over in Montserrat. Then we lunched in the town.

Flo and I saw in the New Year at home with the fire blazing.

For many this has been a very poor year, for us it was more of an inconvenience. We managed to buy a House make it habitable, buy a car, and take up residence in Spain. Most of this was made possible by Flo’s love of paper work and her grasp of the Language and willingness to dive in and sort things out.

item.title: Chrishmas Day
item.description: Pre Christmas Day Party Food Time

item.title: Back in Real
item.description: Return to Spain. Just set a provisional date of 18th. Ended up booking for the 19th so Flo could get one more Italian class.
